roleset.name: to address a petition to, to make a request

example.name: autogen1
example.text: DPC Acquisition Partners , a hostile suitor for Dataproducts Corp. , filed a petition in federal district court in Los Angeles seeking to have its standstill agreement with the computer printer maker declared void
example.arg: DPC Acquisition Partners , a hostile suitor for Dataproducts Corp. ,
in federal district court in Los Angeles
to have its standstill agreement with the computer printer maker declared void
